name: OfficePhysio
tag_list: health-and-safety, online-videos, physiotherapy, online-physiotherapy, back-exercises, rsi-prevention
overview:
Have you ever experienced back problems from working at the computer? Here is the solution: OfficePhysio is an online video exercise service to prevent and cure computer-related back, neck & shoulder problems. How does it work? Simple. On www.officephysio.com users watch and imitate easy office-suitable exercises. Customized exercise programs, reminders, and statistics enhance user effectiveness and experience. Clinical studies have shown that users feel noticeably better after only 6 weeks.

Besides the medical advantage, OfficePhysio is the first professional B2B2C cloud service that helps companies to reduce sick leave days, to comply with health & safety standards for both on-site and off-site employees (e.g. consultants) and to increase employee retention and motivation. Also, it provides the opportunity to be socially responsible with the optional incentive program â€œA good deed with every exerciseâ€ which supports good causes.

OfficePhysio: computer work without back problems!
